title: (x) Grotesk on Jake Ridley "Music Production" album cover - Akzidenz-Grotesk {David, Satya}
content:
Hi,

I don’t think it’s AG, nor basic. neuzeit ? no.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011912im_/http:/typophile.com/files/JAKES_4770.jpg)

can someone help ?

 [‹ "No hole is too deep for us" casual script on T-shirt](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011912/http:/typophile.com/node/39378 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) tech sans used in packaging - Gravur {David Rault} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011912/http:/typophile.com/node/39354 "Go to next forum topic")
author: john good

comments.content:
Kinda looks like Akzidenz Grotesk with strokes applied in Illustrator with rounded corners selected.

David
It seems that its been outlined with rounded corners in Illustrator. The basic skeleton is very much like Akzidenz-Grotesk though.
David, it took me 5 minutes to write and you were fast :)

rounded corners, yes maybe that’s it.

I though it could be some kind of [alte-haas-grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20071226011912/http:/www.dafont.com/fr/alte-haas-grotesk.font)

but maybe it’s custom.

+
